titleStmt.title: A seasonable paper presented to the consideration of all that profess Christianity ... / J.P.
titleStmt.author: Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
Penn, William, 1644-1718. Address to Protestants.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Pennyman by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
This piece extracted from Wm. Penn's "Address to Protestants".
Item at reel 1039:9 identified as Wing P1413 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library and British Library.
